long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly and easily search any website you could want in a few clicks. With QuickSearch you no longer have the hassle of going to a page, finding the search bar, typing your search, now all search bars from all your favourite websites are at your finger tips. There is no longer anything holding you back, save time, energy and clear your browsing experience of the stress of bad user interface. QuickSearch is customizable so you only see the sites you want to see. Install QuickSearch now!
